document_data.name: Unluck
document_data.mainbody: '''''Unluck''''' was a [[wild magic]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to affect the forces of chance around the target, giving it a stroke of bad luck for the duration of the spell.
document_data.Components: Proper casting of this spell required [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s and the shard of a broken mirror, which was tossed in the direction of the target and vanished.
document_data.Users:
As a wild magic spell, ''unluck'' was especially common among [[wild mage]]s.

[[Oathbinder genie]]s had the innate ability to use this spell three times per day.<ref>
